vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Est.1.9; married to Ahasuerus (H0325)
§ Vashti = "beautiful"
the queen, wife of Ahasuerus, whom he divorced for disobeying his orders
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esposa de Asuero, rey de Persia
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瓦實提 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "漂亮的"
亞哈隨魯王的妻子, 因不遵行王的命令而被王廢掉
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
瓦实提 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "漂亮的"
亚哈随鲁王的妻子, 因不遵行王的命令而被王废掉
